**Website :** [http://onyxproject.fr](http://onyxproject.fr)

## Getting Started

The faster way to install Onyx is to use the Pypi Package 

WARNING : Onyx is just for Python<=3.4


```bash
pip install onyxproject
```

And to run Onyx the simple way is :

```bash
sudo onyxstart
```
